articles.description: There was more foot traffic in central Melbourne today than on any Monday morning since the first lockdown last year, but pedestrian numbers were still well below pre-pandemic levels.
articles.content: The relaxation of work-at-home restrictions introduced in March to stem the spread of COVID-19 and extended by a week after the most recent outbreak now means up to 50 per cent of Melbourne's hundred… [+3902 chars]
